hero.title: Dive into a world of adventures with friends
hero.text: AIAtlant is a gaming platform that allows you to create and play interactive adventures and simulators with friends, generated by AI.

heroCard.title: AI-Based Gaming Platform
heroCard.text: ‘AIAtlant’ is a group of enthusiasts who accidentally met in a bar and decided to realize their dream: making games and creating real adventures for themselves and their friends.

infoCard.text:
Currently, **we are in the prototype stage**, so all games are in text form in a Telegram bot!

We strive for the greatest possible variety of genres and are already working on implementing the first graphics!

testInvite.text: Participate in the closed testing of our new games!

list.title: DnD
description: Gather with friends and embark on an adventure!
list.alttext: The image of dragon and knight
list.fullDescription:
You are competing wizards and witches. Clients come to you with all sorts of problems, from Brad Pitt to Harry Potter. Come up with the best solutions, and compete for clients and their money!

You are competing wizards and witches. Clients come to you with all sorts of problems, from Brad Pitt to Harry Potter. Come up with the best solutions, and compete for clients and their money!

You are competing wizards and witches. Clients come to you with all sorts of problems, from Brad Pitt to Harry Potter. Come up with the best solutions, and compete for clients and their money!

**Features:**
Funny and unconventional tasks. Fun competition for the most original, funniest, and most logical solution.

list.title: Sloveska
description: A DnD spin-off focusing on player independence, a larger world, and freedom.
list.traits: A free sandbox in any setting you want.
list.alttext: The image of dragon and knight
list.fullDescription:
**First paragraph:** This gaming mouse features an ergonomic design for long gaming sessions.

**Second paragraph:** It includes RGB lighting with multiple effects.

**Features:**

- Customizable buttons
- High-precision sensor
- Ergonomic design

list.title: Strategy
description: Lead one of the states and use commands to bring it to prosperity.
list.traits: Economy, politics, culture - all under your control. Absolute freedom of action. Try to create any state while competing with others!

list.title: A game about witches and wizards
list.text: You are competing wizards and witches. Clients come to you with all sorts of problems, from Brad Pitt to Harry Potter. Come up with the best solutions, and compete for clients and their money!

list.title: Add animations to the text
list.text: Our current games are in a Telegram bot format. But we want to make them more interactive, so we plan to add animated text and images.

list.title: Launch a campaign
list.text: We want to start an advertising campaign to attract more players.
